instructions.name: initialize
docs: Initializes a new StakePool

accounts.name: stakePool
docs: New StakePool to create

accounts.name: manager
docs: Manager

accounts.name: staker
docs: Staker

accounts.name: stakePoolWithdrawAuthority
docs: Stake pool withdraw authority

accounts.name: validatorList
docs: Uninitialized validator stake list storage account

accounts.name: reserveStake
docs: Reserve stake account

accounts.name: poolMint
docs: Pool token mint

accounts.name: managerFeeAccount
docs: Pool account to deposit the generated fee for manager

accounts.name: tokenProgram
docs: Token program id

accounts.name: depositAuthority
docs: Optional deposit authority

args.name: fee
docs: Fee assessed as percentage of perceived rewards

args.name: withdrawalFee
docs: Fee charged per withdrawal as percentage of withdrawal

args.name: depositFee
docs: Fee charged per deposit as percentage of deposit

args.name: referralFee
docs: Percentage [0-100] of deposit_fee that goes to referrer

args.name: maxValidators
docs: Maximum expected number of validators

instructions.name: addValidatorToPool
docs: (Staker only) Adds stake account delegated to validator to the pool's list of managed validators

args.name: seed
docs: Seed used for generating the validator stake address

instructions.name: removeValidatorFromPool
docs: (Staker only) Removes validator from the pool, deactivating its stake

instructions.name: decreaseValidatorStake
docs: (Staker only) Decrease active stake on a validator, eventually moving it to the reserve

instructions.name: increaseValidatorStake
docs: (Staker only) Increase stake on a validator from the reserve account

instructions.name: setPreferredValidator
docs: (Staker only) Set the preferred deposit or withdraw stake account for the stake pool

instructions.name: updateValidatorListBalance
docs: Updates balances of validator and transient stake accounts in the pool

instructions.name: updateStakePoolBalance
docs: Updates total pool balance based on balances in the reserve and validator list

instructions.name: cleanupRemovedValidatorEntries
docs: Cleans up validator stake account entries marked as ReadyForRemoval

instructions.name: depositStake
docs: Deposit some stake into the pool

instructions.name: withdrawStake
docs: Withdraw the token from the pool at the current ratio

instructions.name: setManager
docs: (Manager only) Update manager

instructions.name: setFee
docs: (Manager only) Update fee

instructions.name: setStaker
docs: (Manager or staker only) Update staker

instructions.name: depositSol
docs: Deposit XNT directly into the pool's reserve account

instructions.name: setFundingAuthority
docs: (Manager only) Update XNT deposit, stake deposit, or XNT withdrawal authority

instructions.name: withdrawSol
docs: Withdraw XNT directly from the pool's reserve account

instructions.name: createTokenMetadata
docs: Create token metadata for the stake-pool token

instructions.name: updateTokenMetadata
docs: Update token metadata for the stake-pool token

instructions.name: increaseAdditionalValidatorStake
docs: (Staker only) Increase stake on a validator again in an epoch

instructions.name: decreaseAdditionalValidatorStake
docs: (Staker only) Decrease active stake again from a validator

instructions.name: decreaseValidatorStakeWithReserve
docs: (Staker only) Decrease active stake on a validator

instructions.name: redelegate
docs: (Staker only) Redelegate active stake on a validator
DEPRECATED: This instruction will not be enabled

instructions.name: depositStakeWithSlippage
docs: Deposit some stake into the pool with slippage constraint

instructions.name: withdrawStakeWithSlippage
docs: Withdraw stake from the pool with slippage constraint

instructions.name: depositSolWithSlippage
docs: Deposit XNT with slippage constraint

instructions.name: withdrawSolWithSlippage
docs: Withdraw XNT with slippage constraint

instructions.name: setMaxValidatorStake
docs: (Manager only) Update the maximum stake per validator

fields.name: version
docs: Version of the stake pool program

fields.name: accountType
docs: Account type, must be StakePool

fields.name: manager
docs: Manager authority

fields.name: staker
docs: Staker authority

fields.name: stakeDepositAuthority
docs: Stake deposit authority

fields.name: stakeWithdrawBumpSeed
docs: Stake withdrawal authority bump seed

fields.name: validatorList
docs: Validator stake list storage account

fields.name: reserveStake
docs: Reserve stake account

fields.name: poolMint
docs: Pool Mint

fields.name: managerFeeAccount
docs: Manager fee account

fields.name: tokenProgramId
docs: Pool token program id

fields.name: totalLamports
docs: Total stake under management

fields.name: poolTokenSupply
docs: Total supply of pool tokens

fields.name: lastUpdateEpoch
docs: Last epoch the total_lamports field was updated

fields.name: lockup
docs: Lockup that all stakes in the pool must have

fields.name: epochFee
docs: Fee taken as a proportion of rewards each epoch

fields.name: nextEpochFee
docs: Fee for next epoch

fields.name: preferredDepositValidatorVoteAddress
docs: Preferred deposit validator vote account pubkey

fields.name: preferredWithdrawValidatorVoteAddress
docs: Preferred withdraw validator vote account pubkey

fields.name: stakeDepositFee
docs: Fee assessed on stake deposits

fields.name: stakeWithdrawalFee
docs: Fee assessed on withdrawals

fields.name: nextStakeWithdrawalFee
docs: Future stake withdrawal fee

fields.name: stakeReferralFee
docs: Fees paid out to referrers on referred stake deposits

fields.name: solDepositAuthority
docs: XNT deposit authority

fields.name: solDepositFee
docs: Fee assessed on XNT deposits

fields.name: solReferralFee
docs: Fees paid out to referrers on referred XNT deposits

fields.name: solWithdrawAuthority
docs: XNT withdraw authority

fields.name: solWithdrawalFee
docs: Fee assessed on XNT withdrawals

fields.name: nextSolWithdrawalFee
docs: Future XNT withdrawal fee

fields.name: lastEpochPoolTokenSupply
docs: Last epoch's total pool tokens, used for APR estimation

fields.name: lastEpochTotalLamports
docs: Last epoch's total lamports, used for APR estimation

fields.name: maxValidatorStake
docs: Maximum stake per validator

fields.name: _reserved
docs: Reserved space for future use

fields.name: status
docs: Status of the validator stake account

fields.name: voteAccountAddress
docs: Validator vote account address

fields.name: activeStakeLamports
docs: Amount of active stake delegated to this validator

fields.name: transientStakeLamports
docs: Amount of transient stake delegated to this validator

fields.name: transientSeedSuffixStart
docs: Start of the transient seed suffix range

fields.name: transientSeedSuffixEnd
docs: End of the transient seed suffix range

fields.name: lastUpdateEpoch
docs: Last epoch this validator was updated

fields.name: numerator
docs: Amount of fee to charge, represented as numerator

fields.name: denominator
docs: Maximum amount of fee to charge, represented as denominator

fields.name: unixTimestamp
docs: Unix timestamp of lockup expiration

fields.name: epoch
docs: Epoch of lockup expiration

fields.name: custodian
docs: Lockup custodian

errors.name: AlreadyInUse
errors.msg: The account cannot be initialized because it is already in use

errors.name: InvalidProgramAddress
errors.msg: The program address provided doesn't match the value generated by the program

errors.name: InvalidState
errors.msg: The stake pool state is invalid

errors.name: CalculationFailure
errors.msg: The calculation failed

errors.name: FeeTooHigh
errors.msg: The fee specified is too high

errors.name: WrongAccountMint
errors.msg: The specified account is not a mint

errors.name: WrongManager
errors.msg: The manager signature is invalid

errors.name: SignatureMissing
errors.msg: Required signature is missing

errors.name: InvalidValidatorStakeList
errors.msg: The validator stake list is invalid

errors.name: InvalidFeeAccount
errors.msg: The manager fee account is invalid

errors.name: WrongPoolMint
errors.msg: The specified pool mint account is wrong

errors.name: WrongStakeStake
errors.msg: The specified stake account is not in the stake state

errors.name: UserStakeNotActive
errors.msg: The user stake is not active

errors.name: ValidatorAlreadyAdded
errors.msg: The validator stake account already exists

errors.name: ValidatorNotFound
errors.msg: The specified validator is not in the pool

errors.name: InvalidStakeAccountAddress
errors.msg: The stake account address provided doesn't match a derived address

errors.name: StakeListOutOfDate
errors.msg: The stake list is out of date

errors.name: StakeListAndPoolOutOfDate
errors.msg: The stake list and pool are out of date

errors.name: UnknownValidatorStakeAccount
errors.msg: The validator stake account is not found in the stake pool

errors.name: WrongMintingAuthority
errors.msg: The mint authority provided doesn't match the pool's mint authority

errors.name: UnexpectedValidatorListAccountSize
errors.msg: The size of the validator stake list is incorrect

errors.name: WrongStaker
errors.msg: The staker provided is not recognized

errors.name: NonZeroPoolTokenSupply
errors.msg: The pool token supply is not zero on initialization

errors.name: StakeLamportsNotEqualToMinimum
errors.msg: The stake lamports must equal the minimum balance

errors.name: IncorrectDepositVoteAddress
errors.msg: The provided deposit stake is not delegated to the preferred deposit vote account

errors.name: IncorrectWithdrawVoteAddress
errors.msg: The provided withdraw stake is not the preferred deposit vote account

errors.name: InvalidMintFreezeAuthority
errors.msg: The mint freeze authority provided doesn't match the pool's freeze authority

errors.name: FeeIncreaseTooHigh
errors.msg: The fee increase exceeds the allowed limit

errors.name: InvalidStakeMinimumDelegation
errors.msg: The stake minimum delegation is invalid

errors.name: WrongTokenProgramId
errors.msg: The provided token program doesn't match the pool's token program

errors.name: UnsupportedFeeType
errors.msg: Unsupported fee type

errors.name: InvalidSolDepositAuthority
errors.msg: Invalid XNT deposit authority

errors.name: SolWithdrawalAuthorityRequired
errors.msg: No XNT withdraw authority signature when required

errors.name: InvalidSolWithdrawAuthority
errors.msg: Invalid XNT withdraw authority

errors.name: SolTransferFailed
errors.msg: XNT transfer failed

errors.name: InsufficientSolReserves
errors.msg: Not enough XNT in the reserve

errors.name: InvalidMetadataAccount
errors.msg: Invalid metadata account

errors.name: InstructionNotSupported
errors.msg: This instruction is not supported

errors.name: InvalidStakeProgram
errors.msg: The provided stake program is invalid

errors.name: InvalidSystemProgram
errors.msg: The provided system program is invalid

errors.name: WrongRentSysvar
errors.msg: Incorrect rent sysvar account

errors.name: WrongClockSysvar
errors.msg: Incorrect clock sysvar account

errors.name: WrongStakeHistorySysvar
errors.msg: Incorrect stake history sysvar account

errors.name: NewAuthorityRequiredOnSetX
errors.msg: New authority must be provided when setting funding authority

errors.name: MinimumReserveLamportsCheckFailed
errors.msg: Minimum reserve lamports check failed

errors.name: ExceedsMaximumValidatorYield
errors.msg: The amount to burn exceeds the maximum validator yield

errors.name: SlippageExceeded
errors.msg: The slippage limit has been exceeded

errors.name: MaxValidatorStakeExceeded
errors.msg: Maximum validator stake exceeded
